bibl.title: Telegram from Blossom Reed to Philip Showalter Hench, July 23, 1950

div1.p: Blossom Reed informs Hench that her mother, Emilie Lawrence Reed, has died.

div1.head: Telegram from Blossom Reed to Philip Showalter Hench, July 23, 1950
div1.opener:
WESTERN
UNION
W. P. MARSHALL, PRESIDENT
CLASS OF SERVICE
----
This is a full-rate
Telegram or Cable-
gram unless its de-
ferred character is in-
dicated by a suitable
symbol above or pre-
ceding the address.
1201
__________________________________________________
The filing time shown in the date line on telegrams and day letters is STANDARD TIME at point of origin. Time of receipts is STANDARD TIME at point of destination
MA025 PA049
P.HXA024 PD=BLUE RIDGE SUMMIT PENN 23 1036A=
1950 JUL 23 AM 9 47
DR PHILIP HENCH= 102-110 SECOND AVE SOUTHWEST ROCHESTER MINN=
div1.p:
MOTHER PASSED QUIETLY AWAY THIS MORNING FUNERAL TUESDAY IN
ARLINGTON 3:30=
div1.closer:
BLOSSOM= 3:30=(
THE COMPANY WILL APPRECIATE SUGGESTIONS FROM ITS PATRONS CONCERNING ITS SERVICE
